name: Steel Yourself! A Rabbit & Steel Miniset

cards.rules_text:
Vigilance
[i]To me, my knights![/i] — Whenever Matti, the Paladin becomes the target of a spell or ability you control for the first time each turn, prevent the next 2 damage that would be dealt to Matti this turn and create two 1/1 white Mouse Knight creature tokens.

Flying
Whenever Ranalie enters or attacks, it deals 3 damage to up to one nonplayer target. Then create a Treasure token. Then exile the top card of your library. Until your next turn, you may play that card.

Menace
[i]Cleaving one side!![/i] — Whenever Merran becomes blocked, defending player sacrifices a creature of their choice blocking it.
Whenever Merran deals combat damage to a player, that player discards a card.

Trample
[i]Follow the colors[/i] — At the beginning of your first main phase, choose a color. Until end of turn, whenever a player casts a spell of that color, put a +1/+1 counter on Avy.

Flying
[i]Pay Attention[/i] — When Twili enters, reveal the top five cards of your library, then put them back in the same order.
At the beginning of your upkeep, reveal the top card of your library. You may play it. Spells cast this way cost {3} less to cast.

Vigilance, menace, lifelink, haste
Whenever Shira attacks, reveal the top five cards of your library. Put a land card revealed this way onto the battlefield. Put a nonland card revealed this way into your hand. Put the rest into your graveyard.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“I cannot accept this... I'll show you. I'll show everyone! That I am worthy of their love!”[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Myriad
If Tassha is a token, it isn't legendary.
[i]First attack is simple, okay? —[/i] When Tassha enters, target creature an opponent controls gets -1/-1 until end of turn.

This spell can't be countered.
Steel Yourself! deals 5 damage to target attacking or blocking creature. The damage can't be prevented.

Double strike
[i]Twirling Rose and Falling Petal[/i] — Whenever this creature deals combat damage during your turn, choose one:
• You gain 2 life.
• Untap this creature.
• This creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

[i]Assassinate[/i] — Whenever this creature attacks, you may pay {1}{B}. When you do, defending player sacrifices a creature of their choice.
[i]Shadowstep[/i] — {1}{U}: This creature gains hexproof and can't be blocked this turn.

Afflict 2 [i](Whenever this creature becomes blocked, defending player loses 2 life.)[/i]
[i]Shadow Barrier[/i] — This creature enters with a shield counter on it. [i](If it would be dealt damage or destroyed, remove a shield counter from it instead.)[/i]

Haste
[i]Charge up[/i] — Whenever this creature attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on it.
[i]Berserk[/i] — Remove two counters from this creature: This creature gains double strike until end of turn.

Reach
This creature has first strike while attacking.
[i]Cooldown reset[/i] — Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, untap it.

This creature has first strike while attacking.
[i]Roll and Phalanx[/i] — Discard a card: This creature and up to one other target creature each gain indestructible until end of turn. Tap them.

When this creature enters, create a 2/1 green Varmint creature token.
[i]March Command[/i] — Whenever this creature attacks, tokens you control gain menace until end of turn.
[i]Abyssal Call[/i] — At the beginning of your end step, if you control a tapped creature token, each opponent loses 2 life.

[i]Nature's Blessing[/i] — Whenever this creature attacks, you may exert it. When you do, creatures you control get +1/+1 and can't be blocked by more than one creature this turn. [i](An exerted creature won't untap during your next untap step.)[/i]
[i]Astral Seal[/i] — Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, until end of turn, whenever a noncreature source you control would deal damage it deals that much damage plus 2 instead.

Vigilance
When this creature enters, draw a card.
[i]Darkspell — [/i]{1{R}W}, {T}, Discard a card: Target creature gains double strike until end of turn.

[i]Heal up[/i] — {1}, {T}: You gain 2 life.
[i]Level up[/i] cost— {2}, {T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.
[i]Buy an item[/i] — {3}, {T}: Draw a card.
[i]Pet the shopkeeper[/i] — {4}: Untap Asha.

Reach
When Nimi enters, create a colorless Food Equipment artifact token with “{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this token: You gain 3 life.”, “Equipped creature gets +1/+1”, and equip {1}. Attach it to Nimi.
[i]Forced Teleport[/i] — Whenever Saya attacks, you may exile another target creature. If you do, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.

Flying
Whenever you cast a spell with mana value 5 or greater, Karsi becomes a 6/6 Dragon Beast. [i](This effect lasts indefinitely.)[/i]
[i]Match the color[/i] — {T}: Add one mana of any color. Put a +1/+1 counter on up to one target creature of that color. Activate only as an instant.

This spell costs {2} less to cast if it targets creatures you control.
Return two target creatures with the same controller to their owner's hands.
Choose up to four creatures you control. For each creature you chose, each opponent may choose a creature they control. Destroy all creatures not chosen this way.

Discard a card, then draw two cards.
Conspire [i](As you cast this spell, you may tap two untapped creatures you control that share a color with it. When you do, copy it.)[/i]
Untap target creature. It gains reach and indestructible until end of turn.
When this creature dies, look at the top three cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

[i]({T}: Add {W}.)[/i]
This land enters tapped.
{2}{W}, {T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. Activate only as a sorcery.

[i]({T}: Add {U}.)[/i]
This land enters tapped.
{2}{U}, {T}: Surveil 1. [i](To surveil 1, look at the top card of your library. You may put it into your graveyard.)[/i]

[i]({T}: Add {B}.)[/i]
This land enters tapped.
{1}{B}, {T}: Until end of turn, creatures your opponents control lose hexproof and ward.

[i]({T}: Add {G}.)[/i]
This land enters tapped.
{1}{G}, {T}: Untap target creature. Activate only as a sorcery.

This land enters tapped.
When this land enters, sacrifice it unless you pay {1} or control a legendary creature.
{T}: Add one mana of any color.
{T}, Pay 1 life, sacrifice this land: Search your library for a land with a basic land type, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

[i]({T}: Add {R}.)[/i]
This land enters tapped.
{3}{R}, {T}: Create a Treasure token. [i](It's an artifact with “{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.”)[/i]
{T}, Sacrifice this token: Add one mana of any color.
